Miscellaneous Highlights: Lugo kept a juggernaut Yankees lineup in check through seven innings of work on the mound.
Lugo only allowed an 82.9 average exit velocity on batted balls, and he generated a CSW of 38% overall on the nine pitches he threw on Tuesday night.
Others: Terry P commented on Lugo's performance and compared him to Cole Ragans.
Kevin O'Brien mentioned Lugo's dominance over the Yankees and his overall performance in the article.
